headline: Does A US$98 Million LIFO Charge Change The Bull Case For AutoZone (AZO)?
summary: AutoZone recently reported that its past underperformance was driven largely by a US$98 million non-cash LIFO charge, adverse weather conditions, and the absence of prior-year hurricane-related sales, which collectively weighed on margins and earnings. Despite these operational headwinds, analysts covering AutoZone still maintain a consensus “Strong Buy” rating and expect diluted earnings per share to increase for the current fiscal year, even though sentiment has softened slightly compared...

headline: Here is What to Know Beyond Why AutoZone, Inc. (AZO) is a Trending Stock
summary: Recently, Zacks.com users have been paying close attention to AutoZone (AZO). This makes it worthwhile to examine what the stock has in store.
